title: EastEnders reveals revenge porn scandal as Louise Mitchell betrays Bex Fowler and Shakil Kazemi

organizations.name: piers morgan's life stories to tracey ullman show mischa

text:
EastEnders reveals revenge porn scandal as Louise Mitchell betrays Bex Fowler and Shakil Kazemi 
Bex was left distraught when she discovered what her friend had done By Lauren Franklin, Showbiz Reporter 2nd February 2017, 10:51 pm EASTENDERS started a revenge porn storyline in Thursday night involving teen exes Shakil Kazemi and Bex Fowler, and a vengeful Louise Mitchell. 
At the end of last year the BBC1 soap had hinted that a storyline based on this theme could soon be happening when Shakil and Bex decided to exchange intimate pictures of one another before having sex . BBC 4 In Thursday night’s EastEnders Louise Mitchell betrayed Bex Fowler by sending naked pictures of ex-boyfriend Shakil Kazeemi from her phone 
And on Thursday night the drama kicked off when Louise took Bex’s phone in order to send the pictures of Shakil to mean girls Madison and Alexandra. 
A distraught Bex realised what had happened almost straight away and was horrified that her friend had betrayed her. BBC Louise sent the pictures to mean girls Madison and Alexandra BBC Bex was distraught when she discovered what had happened 
She cried: “What did you do? You took my phone and sent it to them? 
“You accidentally scrolled through my weeks of photos and accidentally forwarded it on? It was personal and had nothing to do with you.” 
Louise is currently furious with Shakil and after he failed to defend her when local bully Keegan teased her with video footage of her escaping the recent bus crash, so decided to get her own back. Scott Disick is seen getting cosy AGAIN with rumoured new love, model Amber Davis TV PICKS What's on TV tonight? Shows to watch on Friday 3 February from Piers Morgan's Life Stories to Tracey Ullman Show MISCHA'S PAIN Misha Barton seen for first time since upsetting birthday party meltdown when her drink was spiked with date rape drug GHB SHE'S BACK! Chloe Khan strips to her lingerie for her first photoshoot following her stalker ordeal and health scare KYLIE BINS 'CHEATING' fiancé Heartbroken pop queen Kylie Minogue unlucky in love again after dumping toyboy lover for getting too close to actress 'CLOSEST I WILL COME TO PORN' Kavos party animal Jo moans in delight as she gets elephant inking on Get Your Tatts Out SUMMER READY Imogen Thomas shows off her stunning curves in colourful swimsuits as she launches her new range BBC 4 Last year Bex and Shakil decided to exchange intimate pictures before taking their relationship to the next level 
As the naked pictures are quickly spread around the school Shakil who is currently without a phone remains unaware, however it’s surely only a matter of time before the body-conscious teen discovers this huge betrayal.
